channel.title: [PI] Auto Cache Downloader

item.title: [PI] Auto Cache Downloader
item.dc:creator: @AnderRoo AnderRoo
item.description:
@AnderRoo wrote:

Got it, in case someone else comes along needing help with this you just put a dl. in front of your file… for example if your link is http://dropbox.com/s/j522ljfurt8anjke/cache.zip It becomes http://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/s/j522ljfurt8anjke/cache.zip

item.title: [PI] Auto Cache Downloader
item.dc:creator: @AnderRoo AnderRoo
item.description:
@AnderRoo wrote:

Basically, when I run my client the cache doesn’t download, I’ve had this problem a few times in the past but I’m not sure what it could be. It just makes the cache folder and 6 files.

signlink.java

[code]public static String findcachedir() {
File file = new File(System.getProperty(“user.home”) + “/delusivecache/”);
if (!file.exists()) {
if (!file.mkdir())
return secondDir();
}
return System.getProperty(“user.home”) + “/delusivecache/”;
}

public static String secondDir() {
	File file = new File("c:/delusivecache/");
	if (!file.exists())
		file.mkdir();
	return file.toString();
}[/code]

CacheDownloader.java

Read full topic
